thread.title: Former Chelsea star Alexei Smertin appointed Russian football anti-racism chief despite denying it exists and claiming fans taunted a black player with a banana just ‘for fun’

author: fnathan
title: Former Chelsea star Alexei Smertin appointed Russian football anti-racism chief despite denying it exists and claiming fans taunted a black player with a banana just ‘for fun’
text:
EFL not that smert Former Chelsea star Alexei Smertin appointed Russian football anti-racism chief despite denying it exists and claiming fans taunted a black player with a banana just ‘for fun’ 
The former Blues midfielder is the anti-racism and discrimination inspector ahead of World Cup By Fred Nathan
